title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.12 - Licensing examination for registered dental assistant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.12 - Licensing examination for registered dental assistant

State Regulations
(a) Each candidate for licensure as a
registered dental assistant shall pass an examination that the department has
deter mined measures the applicant's knowledge of curricular areas attained in
a program prescribed in section
52.26
of this Title and other
matters of law, ethics, or practice deemed appropriate by the
department. (b) Passing standard. The passing standard for each examination shall be determined by the State

Board for Dentistry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
61.12

Amended

New

York State Register February 26, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 08, eff. 2/26/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
